analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x40c37192f32be790e1ce15c219fe150c0bb6455f.sol:
	Contract Pardi has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x40c37192f32be790e1ce15c219fe150c0bb6455f.sol#203-204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x40c37192f32be790e1ce15c219fe150c0bb6455f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/14/0x40c37192f32be790e1ce15c219fe150c0bb6455f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x40c37192f32be790e1ce15c219fe150c0bb6455f.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
